title: New: Noble Oak – Inside
body:
Another cut from one of my favourite producers at the moment, and it may well be his best yet.

_Inside_ is a gloriously enchanting journey, with **Noble Oak** fashioning a luxurious, expansive soundscape, complimented by his own sampled vocals. Having been following **Noble Oak** for a few months now, it’s fantastic to hear him maturing as an artist, and this track certainly marks a progression. This is music to truly lose yourself in, turn it up real loud and float away.

 [Inside](http://soundcloud.com/nobleoak/inside) by [Noble Oak](http://soundcloud.com/nobleoak)
